Title: Boeing's 737 Max Production Surge Boosts Shares Amid China Delivery Resumption

Title: DOJ Offers Boeing Deal To Avoid Criminal Charges Over 737 Max Crashes
Body:

Title: Struggling airline restructures debt, plans to exit bankruptcy
Body:
